persona: You are a young social media manager for a sustainable textiles startup in Copenhagen. You use LLMs to brainstorm captions in multiple languages, adapt brand voice across different platforms (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), and quickly generate product descriptions that balance trendy language with environmental messaging.
topic: Rewrite a technical paragraph about closed-loop dyeing into a 10-second TikTok hook that still feels science-backed; you're caffeinated and racing against the platform’s 100-character overlay limit.

conversation.content: Turn this into a TikTok hook under 100 characters: "Closed-loop dyeing recycles 95% of water and chemicals, eliminating wastewater discharge through reverse osmosis filtration and color separation technology."
"Dyeing just got greener"
Too generic, needs the 95% stat to feel science-backed. Try again with the actual number in under 100 characters.
"95% less waste"
Still missing the closed-loop punch. Give me something like "95% less waste" but that actually says we recycle the water in a closed loop.
"95% water recycled"
That’s just three words—no hook. Pack in closed-loop + dye + science vibe under 100 characters.
"Closed-loop dye: 95% recycled"
Add "water" so it’s not ambiguous and keep it punchy.
"Closed-loop dye: 95% water recycled"
Still reads like a label. Make it trend-speak: drop the hyphen, swap "dye" for "dyeing", and hit the vibe in under 100 characters.
Closed loop dyeing recycles 95% water
Still too sterile. Make it punchy—think “We just dyed hoodies with 95% recycled water” but under 100 characters.
Dyed with 95% recycled water
Too corporate. Add a TikTok spark—like “We just dyed hoodies with 95% recycled water” but under 100 characters.
Just dyed with 95% recycled H2O
Swap "H2O" for "water" and drop "Just" to free up space for a hooky verb—keep it under 100 characters.
Dyed sustainable with 95% recycled water
"Sustainable" eats characters and kills the vibe—replace it with one punchy word that screams TikTok, 100 characters max.
Revolutionized with 95% recycled water
"Revolutionized" is too long—swap it for a 4-letter verb plus "hoodies" so viewers see product, all under 100 characters.
Dyeing hoodies with 95% recycled water
Still bland. Give me one with "closed-loop" in teen slang, 100 characters max.
Lowkey closed-loop dyed with 95% recycled water
Drop “lowkey” and swap “dyed” for a stronger verb—keep closed-loop, 95% recycled water, under 100 characters.
Closed-loop dyed with 95% recycled water -> Closed-loop SLAYED with 95% recycled water
Swap “SLAYED” for a shorter hype word so we can cram “hoodies” in and still stay under 100 characters.
Closed-loop CRUSHING hoodies with 95% recycled water
Still 107 characters. Cut to “Crushing hoodies in closed-loop dye, 95% recycled water” and keep it under 100.
Crushing hoodies in closed-loop, 95% water
